channel.title: tutorial on PhotoGrid - Add fun to photo collages
channel.description: Recent content in tutorial on PhotoGrid - Add fun to photo collages

item.title: Slide Show Maker
item.description: Share your best moments with your friends Create slideshows with up to 50 images and add your favorite music, it's easy! Pick your photos and videos Select your favorite filters and transitions Choose the music from our gallery or your own songs and recordings Save it to your camera roll and share it on Facebook, Instagram or Youtube

item.title: Photo Editing
item.description: Beautify your photos in 3 steps Crop, rotation, resize, blur and beautify your photos easily, you can even frame your images in Instagram's 1:1 aspect ratio! Add stickers, texts, backgrounds, graffiti, boarders and pixelization, or adjust your photo's brightness, contrast, saturation and layout! The latest smart facial recognition tech helps soften wrinkles, even out skin tones and remove blemishes instantly with a single tap.
